ComicInfo.Series: Gene Roddenberry's Xander in Lost Universe
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dumar's orbit brings it considerably closer to its sun, compared to Earth standard reference. A gas giant, it's thick upper atmosphere effectively shields the lower regions from the sun's heat and radiation, causing most Dumarian lifeforms to dwell high above the planet's actual surface at what is called base level. At base level, huge floating moss beds, at least 30 kilometers thick and the size of Earth continents, provide an environment capable of supporting Dumar's inhabitants. The average Dumarian is six to eight feet tall, yellowed skin and possesses eyesight 30 times more powerful than humans, due to their worlds brilliant light spectrum. most learn to fly before the age of six, and this is one reason for their reputation as Plan*Net's best starcraft Pilots. They are also one of the few races making effective use of solar sail technology for interplanetary travel... (taken from comic)
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/xander-in-lost-universe-3/4000-142993/
ComicInfo.Title: Race for the Lost Universe
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
